reviews.review:
worst game to ever be this popular. first of all if you live in europe you can only play with brain dead russians that dont know english. They are so incredibly stupid and retarted i just want to put a dick in my asshole and slit my wrists.
I liked it before so i bought the "battle pass", worst mistake of my life. It sucks and the challanges dont stack forcing you to play 9999999999999999999999999 matches when you could have just played one. 

The game has made me extremely racist towards all russians and i want to nuke russia. I will slit my wrists and sit back and relax the last moments of my life knowing that this game is losing its playerbase. 

Conclusion:
The game and  community sucks my bunghole
this game is awesome .. haha .. try it dude !

After 1300 very long hours, over a span of 5 years, I have concluded that this game is trash. It's toxic community makes the game hard to play, and all the little kids, and the people that throw the game just to hurt your rank. all makes this game unplayable, but i'm addicted so i'm going to go play a few games.
